title: Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of Technology: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placements, Rankings
meta_description: Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of Technology Admission 2024 is open for various degree programs based on TS EAMCET and other entrance exam scores. Check latest updates and news on Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of TechnologyAdmission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Eligibility, and Admission Process

basic_info.name: CBIT Hyderabad Admission
description: B.Tech/BE admission is done based on marks obtained on TS-EAMCET. Admission to the ME/MTech is done based on marks obtained in PGECET or GATE. Admission to MCA & MBA is done based on marks obtained in TS-ICET. Candidates must apply for the entrance exams on their respective websites

basic_info.name: CBIT Hyderabad Placements
description: Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of Technology has a dedicated Training and Placement Centre for students, established in 1987. In the year 2019-20, 1228 students were placed, out of which 1103 were from undergraduate programs and 125 were from PG programs.
The institute has witnessed an increase in the no. of placement offers year after year. From the year 2000 onwards, a total number of 15284 students have been placed in leading companies
Over a hundred domestic and international companies recruit from the university. Some of the top recruiters are

basic_info.name: CBIT Hyderabad Facilities
description: The institute has a wide range of facilities for the benefit of the students

faqs.question: Is CBIT Hyderabad good?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is a very good college with a great placement record. There are experienced faculty members and also a pleasant environment with excellent facilities.

faqs.question: Does CBIT Hyderabad have a hostel?
faqs.answer: Accommodation is available for students in Junior and Senior blocks. The hostels include a reading room, canteen, computer, entertainment facilities as well as a visitor’s lounge.

faqs.question: How are the faculties at CBIT Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.The institute has over 300 dedicated faculty members, highly trained in their respective fields. The student to professor ratio is 20:1.Of the 300 members, 132 hold Doctorates, while 102 are pursuing their Doctoral Works. The 236 Technical Staff are experienced in guiding students in the practical aspects of the courses.

faqs.question: Can I take lateral entry admission at CBIT Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: Yes, there are seats in the undergraduate programs that are reserved for lateral entry, i.e. admission directly into the 2nd year of B.E or B.Tech program. This admission is done on the basis of the ECET, which is an entrance exam for diploma and for B.Sc. (Mathematics) candidates. Details of the same can be found here.

faqs.question: DoesCBIT Hyderabad provide any financial assistance?
faqs.answer: Ans.Scholarships of 5,000 rupees per month are provided by the institute to students having rank between 1 to 400 in the PGECET exam. There are also scholarships for GATE qualified students by AICTE/MHRD.

Section.name: About CBIT
Section.description:
Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of Technology (CIBT), Hyderabad is a prestigious institute established in the year 1979. It is affiliated to Osmania University and has been approved by AICTE. The institute holds reputable status among many popular ranking agencies. It offers B.E/B.Tech at the UG level and ME, M.Tech, MBA, MCA at the PG level. The institute has maintained a positive placement rate in the four decades of its successful journey
Read more: CBIT Hyderabad Reviews
